text: Ezaki may refer to: * 9756 Ezaki, a main-belt asteroid, named after Yusuke Ezaki (born 1957) * Eiji Ezaki (1968–2016), name of Japanese wrestler Hayabusa * Ezaki Glico, a Japanese food company * Ezzaki Badou (aka Ezaki Badou; Zaki; born 1959), a Moroccan football player and club manager * Kenjiro Ezaki (born 1926), a Japanese composer * Kohei Ezaki (1904–1963), a Japanese Nihonga painter * Toshiko Ezaki, a Japanese musician
title: Ezaki
